summary: Unit test module that verifies the behavior of the Lambdad dictionary transform, checking that arbitrary lambda functions are applied correctly to data entries, that identity and slicing operations work as expected, and that metadata tracking is handled properly with MONAI tensors.
business_intent: Ensure reliable integration of custom lambda operations within MONAI data pipelines by testing their functional correctness, metadata preservation, and compatibility with NumPy and Torch tensors in medical imaging workflows.
